description: Designed to facilitate a profound Flow State experience
details: Focus while you work, write, and engage in virtually any activity that requires relaxed concentration. This track loops the sounds of a running stream, and will help you enter The Flow.
title: Flow

description: Enter the Delta brainwave state, and connect with your unconscious mind
details: Entering the Delta brainwave state is incredibly healing, and often considered to be the gateway to our unconscious mind as well as the collective unconscious, bringing access to the universal psyche or mind.  This track uses a constant drone in the ‘Major Fifth’ interval!
title: Delta

description: Enter into an Theta brainwave state, and deepen your insights
details: The Theta brainwave pattern is often associated with dreamtime, and when accessing this state while ‘awake’ you receive many benefits, including: stress reduction, problem solving, and wonderful creative insights.  This track uses a constant drone in the ‘Major Fifth’ interval!
title: Theta

description: A visualization exercise for overcoming difficulties.
details: Invoke your most revered source of wisdom, compassionate figure or loving deity to help you understand and transform even the most challenging difficulties, in this guided visualization with author and meditation teacher Jack Kornfield.
title: Buddha Nature

description: Soften, open and allow yourself and all beings to receive the love and happiness we deserve.
details: There is no greater form of giving than that of extending our unconditional love and heartfelt kindness to ourselves and all beings. In this short compassion meditation, which can be done at any time and in any place throughout your day, we generate healing intentions and lovingkindness for the benefit of all beings.
title: Compassion

description: Experience the wonder of the ‘Divine 9’ piano
details: A powerful experience of a special piano that emits the frequencies of universal connection and love. This track uplifts you into the vibrations of raw beauty, wonder and gratitude for living.
title: Rejuvenation

description: Change anxiety to peace with this powerful breathing exercise.
details: Renowned holistic health pioneer Dr. Andrew Weil demonstrates a short, powerful breathing exercise to channel your breath and alleviate anxiety, agitation and distress.
title: Breathe Easy

description: Welcome and orientation chat from one of Amplifield's facilitators.
details: Perhaps you can recall a time when you felt more alive than at any other moment - when you had a sudden recognition of beauty, a feeling of deep contentment, and a sense of connection with life greater than you had ever thought possible. And then, this fleeting moment was gone. What if you could recapture that remarkable opening, and make it a consistent way of living in the world?  Throughout the Europe and North America, a man named Eckhart Tolle has emerged as a teacher with the unique ability to draw us into the awakened state he calls presence. With Realizing the Power of Now: An In-Depth Retreat with Eckhart Tolle, you have an unparalleled opportunity to immerse yourself in the timeless dimension - a place within us that always is and ever will be beyond the turmoil of life, a world of calm beyond words, of joy that has no opposite.
title: Intro

description: Relax and release into the vast openness of your soul with a bamboo flute.
details: Flow into this inspiring guided meditation with meditation teacher (and master flautist) Rodrigo Tarraza as he takes you on a journey to the still calm center at the center of your being (with accompanying bansuri flute improvisation by Rodrigo!).
title: Relaxation

description: Explore the vast possibilities of your most imaginative self
details: Subtle brainwave entrainment frequencies combined with the sound of the ocean helps you experience the mystery and wonder of being alive. Great antidote for ‘feeling stuck’, this track helps you feel child-like wonder once again.
title: Curiosity

description: Gain access to your deepest emotions and intuition
details: Combines powerful brainwave entrainment frequencies with uplifting music to calm your mind, deepen intuition, and open the heart. This track guides you to contemplate and uproot any deep, unprocessed emotions.
title: Open Heart

description: Motivate yourself by gaining clarity of purpose
details: Powerful brainwave entrainment music that facilitates flow, clarity, motivation and intense focus. Listen to the sounds of rolling waves while you are working, writing, and engaged in other thoughtful activities.
title: Focus

description: Step away from the cares and concerns of your day, and rest deeply in the stillness within.
details: Take one deep breath and just a minute to enjoy this short, guided meditation. When you’ve mastered the art of ‘just-a-minute’ – taking a brief break from your outer activities to slip into a quiet space inside – you can do it at any time, anywhere.
title: Being Myself

description: Listen a very special synchronized prayer in honor of 9/11
details: Firefighter Erik Lawyer guides into a prayer of remembrance for all the victims, heroes, and continued wars happening in our world today. Join us in remembering 9/11, and pray for collective healing.
title: 9/11 Prayer

description: Invoke the practice of forgiveness to heal wounds we may have caused or endured.
details: As we deepen in our practice and our hearts begin to open, many painful obstacles may appear. Join author and meditation teacher Jack Kornfield in this guided invocation of the powerful healing force of forgiveness to heal ourselves and seek forgiveness for pain we may have caused another.
title: Forgiveness

description: Facilitates crisp concentration and heightened awareness
details: Super-charge is an expansive 3D holophonic nature soundtrack infused with advanced brainwave technology helping you quickly access profound states of focus, relaxation and creative energy.
title: Super-charge

description: Ideal track for your daily meditation practice
details: Using a variety of entrainment frequencies, Profound helps you cultivate inner awareness and establish a meditation practice that ‘sticks’. Set to the sound of continuous rain, this track increases focus and performance while relieving stress and anxiety.
title: Profound

description: Open your senses to the energy of life flowing effortlessly within us and around us.
details: Allow each breath to gently anchor you in each moment, nourishing you and energizing your being. Then expand your awareness to include your whole body and then further, to include all phenomena arising within your awareness, as gently come to rest, alert and relaxed, in the heart of consciousness.
title: 5 minutes

description: Event #2 in conjunction with the COP21 climate change conference
details: Gaia Field Project founder David Nicol creates a beautiful 'resonant field' with thousands of participants around the globe meditating together to support the COP21 summit in Paris. This event was attended by dozens of leaders from various indigenous nations from all over the world.
title: COP21 Event 2

description: Meditate to this very powerful and beautiful Mantra
details: The Ho’oponopono prayer is ‘I love you, I’m sorry, please forgive me, thank you’, and this track embodies the energy of this transformative mantra. Meditating with this track connects you with the frequencies of compassion and forgiveness.
title: Ho'oponopono

description: Detoxify unpleasant thoughts or feelings
details: Relaxing brainwave entrainment runs underneath the sounds of ocean waves to help you feel more calm, poised, relaxed, centered, confident and harmonious. Meditate with this track to let go of everything that no longer serves you.
title: Purify

description: Listen to the very first synchronized event on The Amplifield
details: A guided foray into the purpose of The Amplifield with co-facilitator Todd Jason. Meditate with the community while listening to the Enliven track which fosters vitality and connective energy!
title: Enliven Sync

description: Join the community in a powerful prayer for Water
details: We live on a Water Planet, and it’s important to utilize the connectivity modern-day technology offers us by sending loving energy and appreciation for the substance which gives us life. Listen to this prayer with an 'Open Heart', as this is the name of the music track which accompanies the prayer.
title: Water Prayer

description: Inaugaral meditation for the COP21 Climate change conference
details: Climate expert for the French government Nicolas Beriot kicks off the twe-week global ecology conference in Paris with a beautiful invocation drawing us in to add energetic support for all the delegates. Barbara Marx Hubbard concludes the event with a guided meditation that had over 2,000 people dropping into a state of coherence.
title: COP21

description: Experience a drug-free vacation from stress and anxiety
details: Set to beautiful ambient music, the purpose of Serenity is to facilitate transformative flow-states and help you flourish, grow and evolve in today’s turbulent but exciting times.
title: Serenity

description: Sit quietly and mindfully to access the stillness at the center of your being.
details: Whether you are just starting out with meditation or are an experienced practitioner, join author and meditation teacher Jack Kornfield as he guides you step-by-step through the essential and timeless practice of mindful meditation for the cultivation of non-judgmental awareness.
title: Sitting Meditation

description: Let your inner light shine brightly in this meditation on light, love and flow.
details: Spiritual teacher Sally Kempton guides you through a meditation on being grounded like a mountain, perfectly aligned and majestic, allowing our own subtle energy, the blissful light of the cosmos, to flow effortlessly through you -- as you.
title: Freedom

description: Find your true heart and generate compassion for yourself and all beings.
details: Join author and meditation teacher Jack Kornfield as he leads us through the traditional Buddhist Loving Kindness (Metta) meditation, used for centuries to cultivate peace, love and forgiveness for ourselves and for all beings.
title: Loving Kindness

description: Bliss infused music for opening The Heart
details: Listen to this beautiful music / chant and witness your heart open. This track also induces a lessening of fear and anxiety, allowing a larger, whole, and loving Self to emerge. Meditate with a ‘Letting Go’ attitude
title: Anahata

description: Guide your awareness through the sensations of the body.
details: Body Scan meditation guides you through the sensations of the body, from your head to your toes, for increased awareness, releasing hidden blocks and relaxing the mind as you flow with the energy of the life force within you.
title: Body Scan I

description: Go on a shamanic journey of discovery, healing and vision
details: Inducing Theta and Alpha brainwave states, Vision Quest’s ambient harmony is designed to help you experience inner vision, shamanic states of consciousness, new perspectives on life, wakeful dreaming, and deep meditation.
title: Vision Quest

description: A gratitude meditation to nourish your innocence by rejoicing in life itself!
details: One of the most rewarding things we can do in our practice and in our life is to offer our heartfelt thanks for all the gifts that have been given to us and to rejoice in the ever increasing love and happiness of all beings, with renowned meditation teacher Jack Kornfield.
title: Gratitude

description: Have an acupuncture session with sound
details: Embedded with a unique energetic signature of the human acupuncture meridian map, this track uses nature sounds (crickets) to optimize the healthy flow of Qi through all the acupuncture meridians. Experience feeling uplifted, calm, and invigorated.
title: Audio Acupuncture

description: Invite peace into your being, touching your heart, reigniting hope, and sharing the blessings of life.
details: Take one deep breath and just a minute to enjoy this short, guided meditation. When you’ve mastered the art of ‘just-a-minute’ – taking a brief break from your outer activities to slip into a quiet space inside – you can do it at any time, anywhere.
title: Peace Now

description: Heighten your confidence and enthusiasm
details: Joy facilitates a deep sense of invigoration and aliveness in meditation to the sound of ocean waves. Focusing on the Beta and Gamma brainwave patterns, Joy enables you to experience high energy, euphoria, confidence and a positive outlook.
title: Joy

description: Experience the endless arising and passing of phenomena and arrive in the eternal now.
details: Discover the awake and aware presence that is always there, vibrating in the infinite space between all things, in this guided meditation with clinical psychologist and meditation teacher Tara Brach.
title: Presence

description: Guide your awareness through the sensations of the body.
details: Body Scan meditation guides you through the sensations of the body, from your head to your toes, for increased awareness, releasing hidden blocks and relaxing the mind as you flow with the energy of the life force within you.
title: Body Scan II

description: Sit quietly and become aware of just one object in your awareness to calm distractions and soothe disturbances.
details: Take one deep breath and just a minute to enjoy this short, guided meditation. When you’ve mastered the art of ‘just-a-minute’ – taking a brief break from your outer activities to slip into a quiet space inside – you can do it at any time, anywhere.
title: Focusing

description: Silence. Sit in the space between all thinking and doing.
title: Silence

description: Experience the wonderful feeling of Euphoria
details: Beautiful ambient music embedded with subtle brainwave entrainment frequencies guides you into a deep state of bliss. Helps you let go of ‘negative energy’ and increases enthusiasm, confidence and joy.
title: Bliss

description: Enter into an Alpha brainwave state, and feel more relaxed and focused
details: The Alpha brainwave pattern facilitates important processing between the subconscious and conscious parts of your mind. By using this track and entering Alpha, you can feel more relaxed, present and clear.  This track uses a constant drone in the ‘Major Fifth’ interval!
title: Alpha

description: Music that transmits the frequencies of sunshine and spiritual Light
details: Enliven is a beautiful ambient track utilizing the flute and nature sounds to help you feel more uplifted. Encoded with calming entrainment technology this track can be listened to as a meditation or while going about your normal day.
title: Enliven

description: Inhale peace and exhale stress in this ten minute guided meditation on the breath.
details: Meditation on the breath is a perennial and powerful method for focussing your awareness and clarifying your mind. Follow meditation teacher Morgan Dix as he leads you through this uplifting, relaxing and ever-deepening meditation on the breath.
title: Breath

description: Heal your body and mind with the frequencies of comfort and peace
details: Entering the ‘Deep Delta’ brainwave pattern releases anti-aging hormones, boosts your immune system, supports advanced healing and release of toxic stress. Set to calming ambient music, this is a great track for daily meditation.
title: Deep Delta

description: Awareness of body sensations is the starting point for a soaring excursion into open awareness meditation.
details: This inspiring guided meditation leads us though the two essential modes of meditation: focus on the breath and open awareness where inner and outer meet -- and dissolve, with meditation teacher and mindfulness blogger Morgan Dix.
title: Focused Awareness

description: A very unique event where we bless the actual code which builds The Amplifield
details: As we attempt to ‘raise the frequency’ of our digital environments, we think it is vitally important to send energy and blessings and prayers into the actual code itself. The code is what actually builds something like The Amplifield, so take a moment and listen to this beautiful blessing and send your own thoughts into the ‘field’!
title: Code Blessing

description: Dissolve into the pure space of awareness that is consciousness itself!
details: Allow yourself to dissolve into the spacious consciousness of "original mind": the pure space of awareness that is consciousness itself, in this guided visualization let by author and esteemed meditation teacher Jack Kornfield.
title: Mind Like Sky

description: A simple and powerful meditation on the breath.
details: Meditation teacher Sharon Salzberg guides you through this simple yet powerful meditation on the breath: one of the world's most revered methods for focusing the mind, deepening the awareness and opening yourself to the true nature of reality.
title: Mindfulness

description: Synchronize both hemispheres of your brain in Epsilon
details: The Epsilon brainwave pattern has long been used by serious spiritual practitioners and shamans to enter the ‘samhadic’ experience of ultimate oneness. Practice with this one for a while, as it can be deeply healing.  This track uses a constant drone in the ‘Major Fifth’ interval!
title: Epsilon

description: Tune into the sensations of the body is the gateway to awareness of our larger existence.
details: Bringing our attention to the body we enter a field of luminous sensation and from there venture beyond, into the unbroken awareness of infinite space -- and back again.
title: Awareness

description: A powerful, traditional Buddhist meditation on loving ourselves, others, and all beings everywhere.
details: Compassion for others begins by building a foundation of lovingkindness toward ourselves. In this traditional Buddhist Loving Kindness (Metta) meditation, Sharon Salzberg helps us approach our own inner suffering with tenderness and awareness, opening us naturally to the ability and desire to love others.
title: Loving Kindness II

description: Brighten your mood and increase productivity at the same time
details: The sound of ‘windy sweeps’ embedded with powerful brainwave frequencies and harmonics, are calmly energizing. This track facilitates a relaxed, sustained attention while you work, study or exercise.
title: Energize

description: Take a few minutes to become aware of the sensations within you and around you.
details: In this short centering meditation, allow the arising and passing of sensations and experiences to flow through you unimpeded, your breathing gently uplifting your awareness and your belly relaxed, receptive and filled with compassionate intention.
title: 3 minutes

description: Meditate in sync with our Planet and all living things
details: Embedded with the subtle energetic frequencies of Planet Earth, this track guides you into a very centered, grounded and clear state of being. Resonance is Ideal for sensing into your connection with all life and enhances many types of meditation.
title: Resonance

description: Join iAwake founder John Dupuy as we drop into Delta together
details: Sound technologies which help you drop into powerful states of consciousness are a major part to The Amplifield. Listen to iAwake founder John Dupuy guide us into the healing frequency of the Delta brainwave state!
title: Delta Sync

description: A step-by-step journey to forgiveness, love and compassion.
details: Remaining open and loving in the face of difficult emotions is one of the greatest challenges we face in practice and in life. In this guided meditation with renowned meditation teacher Sharon Salzberg, we generate compassion for ourselves, for others, and for all beings.
title: Love in Difficulty

description: Experience a new type of fractal entrainment for intense creativity
details: Utilizing a special type of fractal entrainment, Spark enables you to experience a kinetic resonance with nature while listening to the sound of a crackling fire. Gives you the ability to stay focused while working or studying, on the computer.
title: Spark
Vision & Mission
description: Amplifield founder releases the vision & mission statements for the app
details: Please listen as Todd Jason exposes the all important Mission and Vision Statements for The Amplifield.  As we strive to create a scalable app that hosts millions of people meditating and praying together, it is imperative to have a core set of grounded principles that become the culture of the organization!

title: Day 1 - Heart
description: The program begins by opening the collective heart
details: Day 1 is geared to open our individual hearts, while also guiding us into the experience of interconnectedness in our global, collective heart.  We will utilize a poweful brainwave entrainment track aptly named 'Open Heart' to create grounding for the field of resonance for the next 21 days.

title: Day 2 - Recovery
description: John Dupuy guides into a state of Deep Recovery
details: Day 2 is focused on recovery, which can mean compulsion, addiction or any unwanted thought / behavior patterns. To truly generate a field of resonance we must clear our personal fields, and allow our shared brilliance to shine through

title: Day 3 - Recovery
description: Theta healing amplifies our collective process
details: Day 3 unleashes the power of Theta healing. We will enter into a powerful brainwave state (called Theta) that enables us to clear away blockages holding us back from living our highest potentials.  Doing this together amplifies the impact!

title: Day 4 - Purify
description: Group purification of all that holds us back
details: Day 4 is all about Purification. We will enter into a 20-minute meditation with a powerful brainwave entrainment track called ‘Purify’, and our goal is to continue to clear the collective field.

title: Day 5 - Ho'oponopono
description: I love you, I'm sorry, please forgive me, thank you
details: Day 5 shares Ho’oponopono: an ancient Hawaiian mantra which translates into: ‘I Love You, I’m Sorry, Please Forgive Me, Thank You’.  If you have never practiced repeating this mantra (at least 20 times in a row amid a meditative state), it is a supremely powerful frequency of language. Practicing Ho’oponopono together, on The Amplifield, during out 21-day Consciousness Accelerator practice is simply a no brainer.

title: Day 6 - Rejuvenation
description: Regenerate our energies together
details: Day 6 is a turning point where we begin to rejuvenate the fresh, positive energies of our collective group

title: Day 7 - Energize
description: Activate powerful energy flow into the system
details: Day 7 begins to attune our energies in preparation for higher levels of collective awareness

title: Day 8 - Oneness
description: Experience group Oneness
details: Day 8 is led by Steve Farrell, co-creator of Global Oneness Day.  During this meditation Steve enables us to experience the true capacities of our minds and hearts being connected in this manner.

title: Day 9 - Bodies
description: An experience of our Interconnected Bodies
details: Day 9 is a beautiful 'Body' meditation led by Michael Brabant.  The experience of being interconnected can also be physical, and Michael guides into our own individual bodies in a way that enables us to connect spiritually

title: Day 10 - Harmony
description: Enter a state of collective harmony
details: Day 10 provides us the ability to sense the wondrous harmony that exists between all living things. Enhanced by powerful brainwave music, this session marks the center point of our journey. What better way to celebrate than in deep harmony!

title: Day 11 - Curiosity
description: Attain a state of true curiosity
details: Day 11 is all about recognizing, and honoring, the uncertainty inherent in existence. We must remember to be ultimately curious, incredibly open, and forever curious as we walk through our days.

title: Day 12 - Creativity
description: Join the field of collective creativity and spark
details: Day 12 is about instigating creativity that lies dormant in all of us. We utilize the powerful entrainment track called Spark to call forth our highest creative selves, calling upon this global community to unleash a collective field of imagination

title: Day 13 - Vision Quest
description: Experience a group Vision Quest
details: Day 13 is an awesome experiment-- what does it feel like to journey on a Vision Quest with hundreds of others while connected in The Amplifield? Join in to find out.

title: Day 14 - Bliss
description: Enter the state of collective bliss
details: Day 14 empowers us to feel the joy, harmony and BLISS of being alive. We too often forget what it feels like to be joyful, disregarding the quality of bliss that is always accessible.

title: Day 15 - Focus
description: Join David Nicol of Subtle Activism to Focus
details: Day 15 puts forth a powerful meditation from Subtle Activism founder David Nicol.

title: Day 16 - Flow
description: Enter the Collective Flow State
details: Day 16 organizes our heart patterns into the frequency of collective flow.  What happens when we can amplify our experience of truly being 'in the flow' via this community?  Let's find out.

title: Day 17 - Joy
description: Empower the quality of Collective Joy
details: Day 17 infuses our group with the wonderful frequencies of JOY, harmony and bliss.  Remembering how to feel these joyous qualities is imperative as we move towards higher rungs of shared development.

title: Day 18 - Delta
description: Drop into Deep Delta
details: Day 18 enacts the brainwave frequency of Delta into our minds and hearts. As we draw closer to the Grand Finale, we use Delta to clear away all remaining blockages.

title: Day 19 - Solar Infusion
description: Infuse solar energy into the collective field
details: Day 19 utilizes a track called 'Solar Infusion' which is designed to enact powerful light energy through our collective body.

title: Day 20 - Resonance
description: Resonance for all beings
details: Day 20 starts to bring the program together, and we will meditate for 20 minutes to the track 'Resonance' which enables us generate a powerful field of Love.

title: Day 21 - Finale
description: Join Barbara Marx Hubbard in the Open Heart Finale
details: Day 21 is the finale of our Consciousness Accelerator program, and Barbara Marx Hubbard leads us in a wonderful exploration of what is possible as we come together in this manner.  We end the program with a 20-minute meditation while the track 'Open Heart' binds our connectivity in wonderful ways.
